title: Ticket #6138: Have option to preserve limits, umask?
description:
Motivated by just finding out that a problem BMRB was having with a program crashing under HTCondor was caused by the maxfds limit being different than when it's run on the command line.

Anyhow, we have the option to preserve the user's environment variables (getenv = true) when running a job; maybe we also need to have an option (or options) that allow the system limits and the user's umask to also be preserved.
remarks:
2017-Feb-10 16:14:33 by wenger:
Discussion of this in today's CHTC team meeting -- Miron suggests having some standard limits we set for jobs, rather than trying to preserve the limits from the user's submit environment.
